items.member: London Councils Pensions Collective Investment Vehicle Joint Committee (unpaid)
London Councils Pensions Collective Investment Vehicle Joint Committee

gifts.gift: In my capacity as Policy Chairman I was Deputy Chairman of TheCityUK and in that capacity that organisation regularly invited me to working lunches and dinners normally held in private dining rooms of City institutions. Also in my capacity as Policy Chairman I attended a number of receptions and working dinners as the guest of the German Ambassador, the French Ambassador, the Swedish Ambassador and the President of the CBI. This continued while I was Deputy Chairman of the Policy and Resources Committee. I have been given Membership of the KMPG '20 Club', which provides 'drop in' work facilities, and of Ten Trinity Square Private Club.
Dinner paid for by AIG Group.
